00019  * DEFINES
00020  ****************************************/
00021 
00022 /****************************************
00023  * TYPEDEFS 
00024  ****************************************/
00025 
00026 using namespace std;
00027 
00028 
00029 /**
00030  * @brief Moving average filter for two values.
00031  */
00032 class avgFilter 
00033 {
00034     public:
00035         /**
00036          * @brief Initialize using equal weights.
00037          *
00038          * @param[in] length length of the window.
00039          */
00040         avgFilter(const unsigned int length) : weights(length, 1.0) {};
00041 
00042 
00043         /**
00044          * @brief Initialize using given weights.
00045          *
00046          * @param[in] weights_ a vector of weights
00047          *
00048          * @note The size of the window = the size of the wector of weights.
00049          */
00050         avgFilter(const vector<double>& weights_) : weights (weights_) {};
00051 
00052 
00053         /**
00054          * @brief Adds a new value and computes average using updated values.
00055          *
00056          * @param[in] xval new value x
00057          * @param[in] yval new value y
00058          * @param[out] xavg averaged x
00059          * @param[out] yavg averaged y
00060          */
00061         void addValue (const double xval, const double yval, double& xavg, double& yavg)
00062         {
00063             xvalues.push_front(xval);
00064             yvalues.push_front(yval);
00065             if (xvalues.size() > weights.size())
00066             {
00067                 xvalues.pop_back();
00068                 yvalues.pop_back();
00069             }
00070 
00071             double total_weight = 0.0;
00072             unsigned int i = 0;
00073             list<double>::iterator xit = xvalues.begin();
00074             list<double>::iterator yit = yvalues.begin(); 
00075             xavg = yavg = 0.0;
00076             for (; xit != xvalues.end(); xit++, yit++)
00077             {
00078                 total_weight += weights[i];
00079                 xavg += weights[i] * (*xit);
00080                 yavg += weights[i] * (*yit);
00081                 i++;
00082             }
00083             xavg /= total_weight;
00084             yavg /= total_weight;
00085         };
00086 
00087 
00088 // variables
00089         list<double> xvalues;
00090         list<double> yvalues;
00091         vector<double> weights;
00092 };
00093 #endif // AVG_FILTER_H
